document_data.name: Bluth
document_data.mainbody: '''Bluth''' was a swordmaster of the [[Zhentarim]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was generous with his words to underlings, and believed in duty. He also considered it dangerous to speak overmuch about one's orders.
document_data.Relationships: He oversaw the trap-building of [[Alorth Bloodshoulder]], [[Guld]], and a third, younger swordsman.
document_data.History: Bluth had led an effort to build pit traps on [[Hullack Forest]] ahead of [[Shandril Shessair]] in {{yearlink|1357}}, trading a few words with the three warriors he oversaw.
